Package com.here.platform.location.core.graph.javadsl

Interface PointBasedPropertyMap<K,T>

All Superinterfaces:
PropertyMap<K,List<PointBasedProperty<T>>>
public interface PointBasedPropertyMap<K,T> extends PropertyMap<K,List<PointBasedProperty<T>>>
Specialized PropertyMap for properties that potentially apply to only part of a key.

These properties are represented by a series of points assigning a value to an element at a specific offset.
